title: NGO CSW Forum Events and Ads, CSW 60
desc: The NGO Committee on the Status of Women, NY (NGO CSW/NY) organizes an NGO CSW Forum that includes an NGO CSW Forum Consultation Day, Reception, and NGO CSW Forum Parallel Events during the annual UN Commission on the Status of Women (CSW) meeting in New York.? This year we are offering our members an early bird discount of $10 off both Consultation Day and the Reception!? Sign-up for membership  by November 30th and you will receive your discount code on December 1st. ? Consultation Day: Venue: 92nd St Y, 1395 Lexington Ave, New York, NY  Date: 13 March 2016 Time: 9 AM - 3 PM Reception: Venue: The Permanent Mission of the Republic of Korea to the United Nations, 335 E 45th St #7, New York, NY Date: 15 March 2016 Time: 6 PM - 8 PM NGO CSW/NY Forum Venue: Various Date:?  14-24 March 2016 FAQs What is the refund policy? We do not issue refunds. Can I update my registration information? Yes, login into your EventBrite account to make any updates. Is my registration/ticket transferrable? Yes, you can transfer your ticket yourself on Eventbrite. ? Can I pay in cash or check? No, all payments must be made online. Can I buy tickets for Consultation Day or the Reception at the door? No. Can I make changes to my online ads? Yes, but changes must be made by 7 March 2016. There is a $25 fee for all changes? made. Can I make changes to my print ads? Yes, but changes must be made by 31 January 2016. There is a $25 fee for all? changes made.
